cards.title: Dad's Day of Rest
cards.centerfold: Happy birthday, Dad! Remember, age is just a number—like your golf score! So swing into this year with confidence, and don’t worry about a little gray hair; it just means you’ve got more wisdom to share (or more dad jokes to tell)!
cards.back: Cheers to many more years of fun, Dad!
cards.artistInspiration: vibrant neo-expressionist style with ornate floral backgrounds and bold color fields
